patterns.name: markup.bold.fountain
patterns.begin:
(?x)
                  (\*\*|__)(?=\S)                        # Open
                  (?=
                     (
                         <[^>]*+>                     # HTML tags
                       | (?<raw>`+)([^`]|(?!(?<!`)\k<raw>(?!`))`)*+\k<raw>
                                                   # Raw
                       | \\[\\`*_{}\[\]()#.!+\->]?+         # Escapes
                       | \[
                        (
                                (?<square>               # Named group
                                 [^\[\]\\]            # Match most chars
                                  | \\.                  # Escaped chars
                                  | \[ \g<square>*+ \]      # Nested brackets
                                )*+
                           \]
                           (
                              (                    # Reference Link
                                 [ ]?              # Optional space
                                 \[[^\]]*+\]          # Ref name
                              )
                             | (                   # Inline Link
                                 \(                # Opening paren
                                    [ \t]*+           # Optional whtiespace
                                    <?(.*?)>?         # URL
                                    [ \t]*+           # Optional whtiespace
                                    (              # Optional Title
                                       (?<title>['"])
                                       (.*?)
                                       \k<title>
                                    )?
                                 \)
                              )
                           )
                        )
                       | (?!(?<=\S)\1).                  # Everything besides
                                                   # style closer
                     )++
                     (?<=\S)\1                        # Close
                  )

patterns.name: markup.italic.fountain
patterns.begin:
(?x)
                  (\*|_)(?=\S)                        # Open
                  (?=
                     (
                         <[^>]*+>                     # HTML tags
                       | (?<raw>`+)([^`]|(?!(?<!`)\k<raw>(?!`))`)*+\k<raw>
                                                   # Raw
                       | \\[\\`*_{}\[\]()#.!+\->]?+         # Escapes
                       | \[
                        (
                                (?<square>               # Named group
                                 [^\[\]\\]            # Match most chars
                                  | \\.                  # Escaped chars
                                  | \[ \g<square>*+ \]      # Nested brackets
                                )*+
                           \]
                           (
                              (                    # Reference Link
                                 [ ]?              # Optional space
                                 \[[^\]]*+\]          # Ref name
                              )
                             | (                   # Inline Link
                                 \(                # Opening paren
                                    [ \t]*+           # Optional whtiespace
                                    <?(.*?)>?         # URL
                                    [ \t]*+           # Optional whtiespace
                                    (              # Optional Title
                                       (?<title>['"])
                                       (.*?)
                                       \k<title>
                                    )?
                                 \)
                              )
                           )
                        )
                       | \1\1                      # Must be bold closer
                       | (?!(?<=\S)\1).                  # Everything besides
                                                   # style closer
                     )++
                     (?<=\S)\1                        # Close
                  )

link-inline.match:
(?x)
  ((\!?)\[)((?<square>[^\[\]\\]|\\.|\[\g<square>*+\])*+)(\])
                # Match the link text.
  (\()            # Opening paren for url
    (<?)((?<url>(?>[^\s()]+)|\(\g<url>*\))*)(>?)      # The url
    [ \t]*          # Optional whitespace
    (?:
        ((\().+?(\)))    # Match title in parens…
      | ((").+?("))    # or in double quotes…
      | ((').+?('))    # or in single quotes.
    )?            # Title is optional
    \s*            # Optional whitespace
  (\))
link-inline.name: meta.link.inline.fountain
